comment:
* Description of what an input method would like from an application when
 * extract text from its input editor.

variables.name: token
variables.comment:
* Arbitrary integer that can be supplied in the request, which will be
     * delivered back when reporting updates.

variables.name: flags
variables.comment:
* Additional request flags, having the same possible values as the
     * flags parameter of {@link InputConnection#getTextBeforeCursor
     * InputConnection.getTextBeforeCursor()}.

variables.name: hintMaxLines
variables.comment: * Hint for the maximum number of lines to return.

variables.name: hintMaxChars
variables.comment: * Hint for the maximum number of characters to return.

variables.name: CREATOR
variables.comment: * Used to make this class parcelable.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
methods.comment:
* Used to package this object into a {@link Parcel}.
     * 
     * @param dest The {@link Parcel} to be written.
     * @param flags The flags used for parceling.

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
